Name: En Route: Space
About the game: En Route: Space is a 2 player co-op puzzle game . You and your partner are in an adventure and you must work together to figure out the solutions. It is all about cooperation and teamwork. All the environment and puzzles are specifically designed to challenge your mind. You need to open your mind and observe your surroundings. Remember, you need each other to solve the puzzles. You will be communicating with your partner throughout the game to solve the mysterious puzzles. A good communication is the key to success. Please note that you and your partner need to have a microphone to communicate with each other inside the game. Find a good partner and prepare yourself for an immersive adventure that will sharpen your mind!
